nodes.text: The Intellidor 8 droid brain was a type of advanced droid brain that was installed on the AC series pilot droids used by the Star Tours company sometime between 19 BBY and 0 BBY.

Although the Intellidor 8 droid brain was not mentioned verbally during the Star Tours: The Adventures Continue ride, it was mentioned in Aurebesh on a computer graphic describing the characteristics of the AC Series.
